Reviews.Content: White House has been holding fairly tightly to the number one spot on Trip Advisor for some time now which isn't easy in a city the size of Istanbul and is all the more impressive since they only opened in Dec of 2009. That position is earned by the staff who are excellent, friendly, helpful and quickly make you feel like family. The hotel is small, very clean, and couldn't be located any better for visiting the European side of Istanbul. Set on a quiet street just back from the main Divan Yulo you have main attractions like Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar, Hippodrome, and Basilica Cistern all about a 5 minute walk away. Plus access to the cafe's and teras' of the neighborhood. Walk down the street and the follow the tram tracks and withing 10 minutes your at the Spice Bazaar, New Mosque and Galata bridge where you can grab a ferry, tour boat, or cross over the bridge to take the Tunel one stop subway to Istiklal a popular pedestrians only street full of shops and cafes. Make sure you do supper at 360 on Istiklal, amazing view and food. One other note. We went to the F1 race at Istanbul Park on the weekend of our trip and leading up to the race we were reading all sorts of nightmare stories about traffic getting to and from the park. We decided to skip using the city supplied buses and book a shuttle with Powertours. After about 20 minutes of pickups in the morning once on our way both Saturday and Sunday we were never in traffic and got straight to the track within 45 minutes. Saturday leaving the track was a bit of a nightmare but it boils down to a regularly busy night for traffic trying to cross the bridge from Asia to Europe (five highways feeding into one) and the added F1 traffic. It took 2.5 hours. Sunday night however - hardly any traffic issues at all. The trip took just over 1 hour.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay at Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Huuhkaja
Reviews.Content: We booked two rooms - one single and one double - and stayed here for three nights. We have stayed many hotels around the world, and I must say that this new hotel is clean and spotless. We were greeted by extremely helpful and kind reception staff. Welcome drinks served and we got good brief info about Istanbul. Our luggages were taken to our rooms - nice touch especially for our old mother. Our rooms were shown, how to use AC and digital safe (no extra fee for safe). Our old lady liked her single room, it is enough roomy for one person. Our room for two of us was spacious, we didnÂ´t hear any noices during evenings or nights and we did have very good sleep there. Minibar offered reasonable priced beverages and you can make coffee and tea in your room. Shower did have a good water pressure. Breakfast was turkish styled with few but tasty options. This hotel is located in Old Town, so it is very easy to walk to major historical sights, bars, cafes and some good restaurants. This was very helpful for us as we had this short stay with them. They organize for you free and private airport pickup and also private drive to airport with a fee which is as same as using taxi but more comfortable. Also hotel staff booked us a Bosporus cruise and we made it, though we were late after breakfast and guide just picked up us with private bus. Based on our stay, we highly recommend this hotel for Istanbul stay. I recommend to book Family Room or Superior Room for more space of your liking.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, great staff , very clean hotel.”
Reviews.Author: IVE-Melle
Reviews.Content: We stayed with 4 persons in 2 rooms for 3 nights and had a wonderful experience. This small (22 rooms) , quiet hotel is perfectly situated in the center of the old town and in walking distance of all the top attractions of Istanbul. Also the tram to visit other parts is nearby. The hotel is perfectly clean and the staff is unbeatable helpful. Without any doubt we would recommend this hotel for a city trip into the incredible big city of Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Service and Price in Great Location”
Reviews.Author: winedunce
Reviews.Content: This hotel was outstanding. The hotel staff was so helpful and sweet. They went out of their way to help us with a number of reservations that extended beyond our trip in Istanbul. A special thanks to Elif who really went above and beyond her duties to take care of some reservations we had along the Turkish coast. The staff's English is excellent and they can share lots of interesting insights on the city/culture/history. Truly, their service makes you feel as though you were staying in a five-star hotel. Our car service to the airport didn't show up on time due to traffic and the hotel manager put us in his car and drove us to the airport himself! The breakfast is bountiful and there is plenty to select from, so you can fill up before touring the city. The location is excellent. A quick walk from the Hagia Sofia and Blue Mosque. And, we walked easily to the ferry, Grand Bazaar and other sites as well. We actually stayed in two different rooms. We were in a small room to start - which was clean and lovely. They upgraded us for our forth night to a large room which was fantastic. This really is an excellent value. I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “everything is great.”
Reviews.Author: flak059
Reviews.Content: I can definitely recommend this hotel especially for couples to see the city. It is situated in the heart of old town. Stuff is very kind and helpful, they take care about everything. The hotel decorated as a palace, so you live like a king. And there's a WIFI everywere, so you're always online. Go with no doubt

Reviews.Title: “WOW!”
Reviews.Author: mjl60
Reviews.Content: This is an exceptional hotel! Cafer, Elif and the entire staff knocked themselves out to make our stay an enjoyable one. They were wonderfully welcoming, super friendly and oh, so helpful. Rooms neat and clean? Yes! Each morning we enjoyed a generous breakfast buffet in the tidy and attractive dining area. For a 5 night stay, we thought our first room a bit "cozy," so requested a larger one. Absolutely no problem! We had more wiggle room right away. Nice! Located in Old Istanbul, it is tucked away on a tiny street within walking distance to many of Istanbul's major attractions and literally dozens of interesting restaurants. Convenient to public transportation as well. Check it out online and then . . . book it!

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location and excellent service; hard to beat.”
Reviews.Author: Mike504176
Reviews.Content: Four of us stayed for a week at this hotel and loved it. The friendly service from all the staff was exceptional and the hotel was clean, modern and a pleasure to return to after a day's hard sightseeing. It is ideally placed for the main Old City sights and is close to numerous good quality restaurants. Harun and his staff made sure we were all well looked after and nothing was too much trouble. A free pick up from the airport on arrival removed all the hassle from our first day and thereafter restaurant recommends and other information were always forthcoming. We left feeling like family rather than customers.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel with great service”
Reviews.Author: AlexandraGotz
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the White House Hotel for two nights and it was located perfectly only two minutes walk away from the old city centre. The staff were very nice and helpful. There was free WiFi, a safety box in the room an a reasonably priced minibar. The room was considering Istanbul very quite. If i ever come to Istanbul again this hotel would be my first choice to stay in the Sultanahmedt area.

Reviews.Title: “Old town location, ace customer service”
Reviews.Author: Gerschenkron
Reviews.Content: If you want to stay in the old town (great for sight-seeing, less good for eating and drinking), then the White House Hotel makes a great option. My room was perfect, with reasonable mini-bar and free wifi but the best thing about this place are its friendly staff - someone came to pick me up from the airport; provided me with a lovely drink and lokum on arrival; and arranged to iron my shorts (the hotel has no iron). All done with a smile. Just remember to take a card from reception with the address and map on the back - taxi drivers - aside from driving like maniacs - weren't great at directions.

Reviews.Title: “Our first experience of Turkish hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Glukija
Reviews.Content: This hotel was opened in December 2009. The staff was wonderful, helping us with everything: a tailor (they walked us to it and even picked up the item after it was ready), tips for food, internet check-in, transport to the airport (while from the airport it was was free!) , allocating us another room because of the street noise (windows have double glazing but one window had an unfortunate mechanical problem). Located quite near the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia and Topkapi, restaurants and within walking distance of the ferries near the Galata Bridge. Beds are a bit hard but they are working on this to 'soften' the problem. Small shop nearby, supermarket around the corner.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and very nice staff !”
Reviews.Author: CaroQ14
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel with a perfect location. Thanks to Calfer, Elfi and all the staff for their help, advices and nice attentions.

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful, friendly, clean and very well located in the old city”
Reviews.Author: karl_erik_kolstad
Reviews.Content: We had a very pleasant stay at the White House Hotel some beautiful days in may. We left rainy and cloudy weather and 4 degrees in Oslo, Norway to visit the exotic city og Istanbul. The city was a great experience, and so was the White House Hotel. The hotel is quite small and intimate, with only 22 rooms. It is located in the heart of the old city, with only 5 minutes walk to the famous attractions. The hotel is almost new, very clean and without noice during night. And the most important; it has a very helpful and friendly staff that takes care of you during your stay. If you are looking for swimming pool, conference centre and numerous bars and retaurants, this is not the place for you. If we should mention one negative thing it must be the absence of fresh pressed orange juice for breakfast. We'll be back some day!! Regards, couple from Norway

Reviews.Title: “Top of the list is justified”
Reviews.Author: Roneva
Reviews.Content: We were efficiently met at the airport and on arrival given cold drinks while we were checking in. We were given a most spacious room, modern, comfortable and extremely clean. Throughout our 3 night / 4 day stay at this Boutique Hotel the staff were helpful in the extreme - nothing that was asked was to much for Elif, Cafer and Omar. Conveniently situated for the best sights and transport our stay was perfect. The breakfasts were simple but completely met our requirements. Certainly it would have been good to have either BBC/ITV or Sky to get the news - it was just after the UK election - but we made do with France24 in English! We'll recommend the White House to anyone considering visiting Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “FORMIDABLE :-))”
Reviews.Author: Nathalie1227
Reviews.Content: Great Hotel ! Good location not far from the grand bazaar the Basilica Cistern and the Blue Mosque Thanks to Cafer Elif for all the great restaurants and good tips and to the entire staff for all their kindness as well. Spacious and very clean room.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel, great location,and wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: part0
Reviews.Content: A lovely hotel with very friendly staff especially Elif and Omar

Reviews.Title: “Great stay - amazing staff & great location”
Reviews.Author: PatyGeneva
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the White House with a group of friends. Throughout our stay, we were impressed by the kindness of the staff who were all extremely friendly and helpful. A big thank you to Cafer, Elif and Emrah and the others. You even receive little surprises and gifts upon arrival and departure. The hotel is brand new and extremely clean. It is centrally located and within walking distance (5 minutes) from the Big Bazaar and the famous Mosques. At night, we could walk to very nice restaurants recommended by the staff. We would definitely recommend the hotel and come back.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Sofia043
Reviews.Content: Great Staff! very helpful beyond duty. Facilities: fantastic value for money. Location: superb- extremely convenient

Reviews.Title: “Quite hotel close to centre with helpful staff.”
Reviews.Author: OzS
Reviews.Content: Newly refurbished with large rooms, friendly and helpful staff with satellite TV this is a good and convenient place to base yourself for seeing Istanbul. Easy walking distance to all the Sultanahmet sites and with a block of good restaurants a minutes walk (up) the street. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service: all the staff is very professional and customer oriented”
Reviews.Author: Francesco61
Reviews.Content: The location is simply perfect: quiet street but in the very heart of Istanbul. All the staff is young, very professional and polite. A special mention to Cafer for his precious suggestions.

Reviews.Title: “everything fine in this hotel”
Reviews.Author: m0ni65
Reviews.Content: This is a brand new and very, very nice Hotel. Everything is perfect: the service, rooms, exteme friendly staff, location etc. The only thing what could be missing is one german televsion transmitter. I recommend the White Housl for Istanbul travellers who are looking for a really good hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Lisbethki
Reviews.Content: The location is excellent for sightseeing and tramway is near. The room and bathroom was clean, but beds were very hard.

Reviews.Title: “Service and location in relation to the price”
Reviews.Author: Lithnert
Reviews.Content: White house is located very near the most important tourist attractions in Istanbul. It is a new or newly renovated hotel. The personnel is very nice and interested in the guests. The street outside the hotell is pretty noisy during the nights with traffic.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay, clean, welcoming and with excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: Wendy060
Reviews.Content: This new hotel is well situated, in walking distance of all the sites ( Blue Mosque, Haghia Sophia, Topkapi Palace and the Bazaars) and also the tram if you want to venture further afield. There are many good restaurants and cafes nearby The hotel is exceptionally clean and our room was spacious and comfortable. Breakfast was reasonably good with the usual buffet of bread, pastries, cheese, eggs and fruit. The staff team were very friendly and willing to help. Emrah in particular assisted us, booking our airport transfer and arranging internet access for us. We were welcomed and well looked after throughout our stay If you want a small, well located hotel, reasonably priced, with staff that care about giving good service, then look no further. Wendy and Ali

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, fantastic location, superb staff”
Reviews.Author: ShionalONDON
Reviews.Content: We were delayed because of the volcano and so 3 days became 7 days. Istanbul is wonderful and the service provided by the hotel made the break a truely fantastic experience. Planning how to return to the UK was made much easier by the help of the staff and the facilties that they provided. The hotel is in a great location and is furnished beautifully. The staff deserve a special mention, particularly Elif who was always very friendly, helpful , happy and informative and Omer always there with a smile and on hand when you needed help. I have already recommended it to friends and would not stay anywhere else if I went back to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “This place knows how to look after its guests”
Reviews.Author: NadiaMontagna
Reviews.Content: In a superb location, only a few minutes from major attractions, the "in tune" staff of this small and charming hotel, made everything easier for us with care and friendship. Our more frequent contact was with the beautiful young lady and Emrah at the front desk but all staff was very very attentive. The breakfast is good but could be better, in special the black coffee could be stronger and hotter. But it is less important. This place knows how to look after its guests. Thank you for all!! Nadia Montagna from Brazil

Reviews.Title: “New hotel, great location, incredible staff”
Reviews.Author: CameliaJS
Reviews.Content: The White House Hotel is a new hotel, opened only four months ago. The room we were in was not big but adequate and very clean. Location is excellent. We walked to the Grand Bazaar and all of the attractions at Sultanahmet.. The tram stop is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The extras are: free transport from Ataturk Airport to the hotel, breakfast included, friendly and helpful staff. We did not have a lot of time to see Turkey. Without the kind assistance of their hotel staff, Cafer, who arranged a personalised one-day tour for us to visit Cappadocia, we would never have been able to experience the grandiose landscapes of the region.

Reviews.Title: “Immaculate hotel, excellent position and superb staff”
Reviews.Author: Amanda186402
Reviews.Content: I have recently returned from an extended stay at the White House Hotel having been trapped by the flight disruptions. If I had to be stranded anywhere, Istanbul would be the location of choice and this hotel, I feel could not be bettered. The location was ideal, being a short walking distance from all the main sights, the hotel is immaculate with comfortable spacious rooms, and is excellent value for money, but it is the staff who make this hotel so special. All the staff should be commended for their helpful, friendly attitude, but particular mention must be made of Omer with his unfailingly cheery smile and of course Elif at reception who provided endless sympathy and cups of coffee during our attempts to find trasnsport home, and who happily made phone calls to airports for us and offered the use of the hotel computer when the other computer was in use. It appeared nothing was too much trouble to ease our stay, and there is no question that this is a hotel I would look forward to return ing to and would not hesitate to recommend to future travellers to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, comfortable, tremendous staff, 1st class service.”
Reviews.Author: MisterJohnH
Reviews.Content: From the moment we were picked up at the airport to the point we were dropped off at the other (Attaturk), we were amongst friends. Everyone from the Reception staff, the waiters, to the cleaning lady, were welcoming, friendly, helpful and good fun. When we were caught by the Iceland volcano problem, they could not have been more empathetic and helpful. Endless tea - and Japheth's own biscuits ('my brother' - with great taste in restaurants and full of sound advice) - attended and assisted, as did Elif, whilst we all populated reception and used their computers to find a way out and tried book it. Elif, the lady receptionist, stunning in her beautiful kaftan, was so helpful with a potential problem with a guide, whom we had inadvisadly hired independently in a carpet shop, very silly, which could have seriously spoiled our visit. The room was comfortable, very clean, perfectly located as a pied a terre for seeing all of Istanbul's famous sites on foot. Breakfast was varied and more than ample. Thank you for your kindness, for a great time and for all of your sympathy, help and generosity when we all found ourselves in difficulty. It was a pleasure to spend my 60th birthday celebration with you.

Reviews.Title: “This is a beautiful hotel with excellent staff that is situated in a brilliant location”
Reviews.Author: 4ZZZZs
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel based on the reviews we had read on trip advisor. We were really pleased we decided on this hotel as our experience there was great. The best things for us were the beautiful rooms and lobby area, the incredible staff including Cafer and Ilif who were welcoming and helpful throughout and also the prime location. The hotel is very new and is making improvements based on feedback all the time. They have listened to the comments about breakfasts needing improving and are addressing this. They are also adding a roof terrace breakfast area which sounds great. If they could get an alcohol licence and extend the roof terrace facility to double up as a relaxing seating and bar area then I think this would make this hotel even better than it is already is.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, amazing service”
Reviews.Author: FlyingNorseman
Reviews.Content: It's kind of hard to call a #1 rated hotel on Trip Advisor "a hidden gem", but tucked back in a relatively quiet street (for Istanbul, that is), the hotel is not the mass market obvious choice. But peek behind it's neon lit facade, and you'll discover a whole new world of personal service - rarely found at hotels at all, never found at hotels this cheap. Free airport transfer is the first sign that this is value for your Lire (for guests staying more than two nights). And from the greeting at the lobby, you will keep on getting amazed by the friendlyness, profesionalism, and utter dedication by the staff for you to feel welcome and enjoy your stay. Emrah and GÃ¶khan on the night shift especially stood out, doing more than you would possibly imagine for me to make the most out of my stay. A few examples of service that amazed me: When you ask what time breakfast start, they ask what time you want to get up. When you ask where to buy tokens for the tram, they give you one. When you ask where to get stamps in the area, they offer to post your postcards for free. ...and the list just goes on and on. Add the fact that the rooms are beautiful decorated, spotlessly clean and the WiFi is reliable and, contrary to most hotels, actually broadband. All this for a price of less than 100 Euros a night? You just canÂ´t beat that! PS! Be aware that sleeping with the door to the french balcony open, might be a problem (at least if you want to sleep in late). Traffic tends to congest in the street, and turks tend to use their horn violently when the traffic doesn't move. Also, the alarm at a neighbouring shop went off six times two nights in a row, and there was loud construction work going on in the building next door (as of mid April 2010). But, hey, this might just be bad luck. The noise aside, this is a perfect hotel for your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Without doubt the best service ever experienced at a hotel”
Reviews.Author: LondonTrip74
Reviews.Content: The whole White House Hotel experience was 1st class and second to none. From the initial booking stage when we required 2 double rooms but only availbility for 1, the hotel has bent over backwards to assist. Received a phone call and email regarding the 2nd room, which we ended up booking as a family room. Only hiccup was the free transfer was not there when we arrived at the airport (although flight was delayed). After a call to the hotel there was a pickup shortly afterwards. Welcome tea and turkish delight was well received. The manager sat down for a welcome chat and offered us a 2nd double room for our return date on the weekend. he found out the trip was for my fiancees birthday and arranged a suprise birthday cake at breakfast the next morning! The rooms were small but well decorated. Every day we returned to the hotel (4 of us, plus 2 other friends that were staying in a nearby hotel) they greated us with a tea and chat. Even our friends were treated as guests at the White House. They booked a meal out for us, plus a hamman visit and return taxi to the airport. A farewell line of all the staff was a nice finishing touch.

Reviews.Title: “Just do it”
Reviews.Author: RoomRaider69
Reviews.Content: Finally a hotel that knows that "boutique" means more than just being small. The service was phenomenal, exceptionally prompt, extraordinarily friendly, completely exceeded my high expectations (given the previous reviews) and set a new standard for small-hotel intimacy. The room was gorgeous, very large, with gilded mouldings and a great chandelier. (The view was slummy, but who cares.) Your cabbie will have no idea where the hotel is, so bring them a printed map. Three minor areas to improve. 1. Breakfast was slim. The OJ was orange-colored sugar water, there was no cut fruit and only one hot selection, and it's in the basement. 2. No Kleenax in the room. 3. The motion sensor on the hall light goes out after about 3 seconds, which isn't time enough even to find your room key.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: ssg11747
Reviews.Content: Beautiful hotel, rooms were spacious and comfortable. Staff was friendly, attentive and helpful. Location couldn't be better if you wanted to stay in/near Sultanahmet area. Lived up to it's reviews.

Reviews.Title: “a nice small hotel at 10' walk from the major Istanbul highlights”
Reviews.Author: fromgentwithlove
Reviews.Content: I liked my stay in the White House Hotel in Istanbul. All the staff was very friendly; some of them asked little bit too many questions or gave too much information; but I can imagine that some guests appreciate that. I am more reserved. I remember Ã–mer and Harun as very helpful and discreet. At check in you receive a welcoming lemonade. If they offer you a city map, don't forget you have to pay it afterwards (about 3 EUR or 6 TL). Breakfast is small and every day the same, but it is a good start of the day. We stayed at the back of the hotel and the view was terrible. If you would like to stay here ask a room at the front side. The hotel is located in a street which is not nice; but the staff told us that will change. After a 10' walk you'll reach the citernes, the Blue Mosk, the Aya Sophia, restaurants, the tramway, Topkapi Palace, ... I really appreciated the free WiFi. I missed a chair in the room; but the staff told us they are ordered and will arrive soon.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay was excellent”
Reviews.Author: BakkerHolland
Reviews.Content: A very good hotel, new rooms, friendly staff, perfect location and good value for money. Definitely a recommendation.

Reviews.Title: “new, clean and incredible staff”
Reviews.Author: preli
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very clean , new and have a good position. The staff was excellent very polite and helpful (Mr. Emrh and the two boys who carry the luggage). The breakfast was more than enought.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, clean, comfortable room and a stellar staff!”
Reviews.Author: SKWBratislava
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a 'superior' room which was very large, by European standards, and extremely quiet. Everything was modern and in perfect working order. We would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Everything was perfect!”
Reviews.Author: yiouliGreece
Reviews.Content: The location is perfect. You can reach the most important sightseeings on foot. The staff is very helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOLIDAYS”
Reviews.Author: ioanna75
Reviews.Content: Everything was great! The best location. At the reception Cafer, Elif and all the others were very friendly and helpful. At breakfast Yagmur and Omar were so polite, a great way to start your day! The rooms were very well cleaned! We really enjoyed our stay there! We certainly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely New Hotel in very convenient location”
Reviews.Author: alfredman63
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the White House in the early evening, reception was quick and efficient, by the friendly and attentive staff who spoke good english. The hotel has been open only a short time and is well appointed and modern. The Bedrooms are relatively small but we knew this having read Tripadvisor. They were adequate as we spent most of our time in the city. The Bathroom was modern with shower/WC, no bath, again we knew this. It was clean and comfortable. Breakfasts were buffet style and included corn flakes fruit a selection of cheese/sliced meat, olives, baguette,jam,honey etc adequate but not superb. It is situated in a side street which is somewhat run down, it stands out as is is a lovely modern property. It is in an excellent location being within easy walking distance from the Blue Mosque, Aya Sophia Museum, Tokapi Palace and many local restaurants. In all we had a very enjoyable stay here. Most enjoyed, Friendly helpful staff, comfortable modern rooms, excellent location near all amenities, Least enjoyed some noise from the street but this probably is experienced elsewhere in the city, TV has limited english programmes but we did'nt need it.

Reviews.Title: “Five star treatment”
Reviews.Author: jason10
Reviews.Content: We were so happy to have consulted Trip Advisor about our choice of hotel in Istanbul. Your number 1 rating of the White House made us feel secure in our choice, and our stay there fulfilled our best expectations. From the warm welcome to our departing minutes, the staff was very attentive and helpful, and warmly so. We want to thank Elif for being such a wonderful hostess and concierge. Our room was very comfortable, breakfast was ample, fresh, and tasty, and Elif's advise and skill was invaluable in making our visit to Istanbul special, in particular an excellent hammam (turkish bath), fine restaurant and entertainment advice. We believe that we received excellent value at the White House: location was terrific, just a short walk to the tram station, and major tourist sights (Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Hag Sophia) and a few tram stops to top restaurants, bazaar, ferries, etc. We would certainly stay there again and hope to return. Thank you White House, and Elif!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent small hotel in perfect location at centre of Old City”
Reviews.Author: Dolman25
Reviews.Content: New small friendly hotel in excellent location in heart of Old City. Staff very helpful amd made great efforts to make our stay an enjoyable experience. No hessitation in recommending this hotel to our friends

Reviews.Title: “The friendliest hotel in Istanbul.”
Reviews.Author: kathleen_patchell
Reviews.Content: Free transportation from the airport, an orientation talk from Elif, and great Wi-fi in the most interesting part of Istanbul. Our small room was spotlessly clean, and we enjoyed the buffet breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, but overrated on Trip Advisor”
Reviews.Author: MarinaCalifornia99
Reviews.Content: We had a very pleasant stay at the White House. Elif, the young woman at the desk is very helpful, smart and funny. She gave us great information about traveling around the city. She provided a laptop with free wi-fi. The hotel is new and clean and well furnished. The hotel arranged pick up from the airport and we were greeted warmly with tea and turkish delight when we arrived. We had a double room, which was very nice with a comfy bed, but the room is really small. There was a desk, but no chair because there was no room for one. There is no place to put even small suitcases. The breakfast is good, but the restaurant is in the basement. The hotel is close to the major mosques, but it is on an industrial street and there was noise from truck traffic, particularly at night. It is the only hotel on the block and it is clearly the nicest building on that block. Overall, the hotel is good, but it is not worthy of its number 1 rating. It is overpriced for what it delivers compared with other hotels in the area. For example, we stayed at the Ataturk Hotel a few blocks away which had larger rooms, was on a more interesting street and had a restaurant with a spectacular view of the Bosporus. It cost 25% less

Reviews.Title: “very good and friendly personnel in a nice and clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: triptex2010
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice stay in the White House Hotel. Starting with a warm welcome and a little talisman present when arriving and help when we needed it until sweets as farewell gifts we always found a nice place here to be. The hotel is less than 5 minutes away from major attractions of Istanbul, like Hagia Sophia or the Blue Mosque. A lot of restaurants around and easy access to public transportation made it a perfect location to start the exploration of Istanbul. A special thanks to Cafer from the reception desk who always gave good advices and recommendations to us.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly home close to top attractions”
Reviews.Author: Andreas2007
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time in this charming and friendly hotel. Rooms are new, bathroom also brand new. Nice view from the rooftop terrace to the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia and Topkapi Palace. What makes this little hotel so special is the very good service. Very helpful staff. We did not have our laptop computer with us, so the hotel organized one for us to make use of free internet wirelessLAN. Free shuttle from the airport was very nice too. Only 200 meters to historic cistern, 400 meters to Hagia Sofia.

Reviews.Title: “Everything was great!”
Reviews.Author: sykorova
Reviews.Content: My colleagues and I travelled on our bussiness trip. I have already visited a few hotels all over Europe, so I can compare and this one was the best one. Welcome drinks, small presents, very comfortable room, super bathroom. Maybe breakfast could be improved a little bit (more fruit, sausages and coffee) but it is the only one remark from our side. All staff was extraordinary helpfull and kind, before all Emrah was great! We can highly recommend. Very good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: “An experience you can not afford to miss”
Reviews.Author: RabBirmingham
Reviews.Content: I first heared about it from the BBC radio, it spoke of a revolution in hotel managment in a city saturated with hotels. It all sounded like a bit of an exageration, but turned out to be all true. I have been to Istanbul no less than 15 times, but my stay this time was a different experience. Every thing from the minute i walked in was unique; the courteous welcome, cleanliess, friendly attitude of staff, and the free internet. Being at a walking distance from the old city, museums, ancient bazaars, and historical turkish baths meant that no matter which direction you want to go, no public transport is needed, hence saving a lot of money. The airport is only TL3 (turkish lira) or $2 away by Tramway instead of TL45 by taxi. All in all, it is value for money, go for it

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Friendly & perfectly situated in the heart of old Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Nickd47
Reviews.Content: The desk staff Elif, Cafer & Emrah went out of their wey to make our stay enjoyable. The hotel is idealy situated for sightseeing, and the tram. It has only recently opened and is spotlessly clean.

Reviews.Title: “Exellent hotel. I strongly recommend it.”
Reviews.Author: Disir
Reviews.Content: If you want to feel like at home in the heart of Sultanakhmet - White House Hotel is the right choice! The transfer from and to the airport that hotel arranged for us was quick and nice, during our way from the airport the driver showed main attractions of Istanbul. We came early in the morning before the check-in time but the room was available - it was very nice. We were offered welcome cocktail with sweets and went to the room which was big, clean, beautifully decorated and comfortable. We stayed for 3 nights, the staff was extremely kind, helpful and friendly. Guys are doing their best. Special thanks to Elif - the girl on reception. Breakfasts were very good too. Very close to main sites and tramway stop (we used tram a lot to get to Dolmabahce Palace, Galata Tower, Taksim etc.).

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, well located, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Diznbird
Reviews.Content: Don't pass this property by, especially if you can get a good rate. We tried to book for the length of our stay but couldn't, but we thoroughly enjoyed our two days here.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful location and wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: Statbat
Reviews.Content: The location is fantastic. It is a very good hotel in the heart of sultanahmed. The hotel staff is very helping and fantastic. I booked their superior room which was fantastic. I will definitely go back there again and also recommend to the people again. Thanks for giving wonderful vacation. P.S. Internet is FAST too (Free Wifi). It matters to me a lot so worth mentioning.

Reviews.Title: “fantastic stay”
Reviews.Author: mau19512003
Reviews.Content: This hotel deserves its rating, the staff could not have done enough, it was located about 5 minutes from the main street and Blue Mosque etc. The room was not large but clean and out bedding was chanaged t least twice when we were there, fantastic shower and clean towels everyday. Wopuld be happy to return and hope we will.

Reviews.Title: “great solution for a short city break”
Reviews.Author: olegna1
Reviews.Content: ideally located close to sites of interest, great choice for any category of travelers. plenty of restaurants around, short waking distance to tram line. And as a bonus great help from personnel and immaculate rooms. Sounds good? Yeah.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location to stay for a reasonable price and nice service”
Reviews.Author: edennnis
Reviews.Content: We've stayed in the hotel for 5 nights and we really liked it. It is located 5 mins walk to major tourist spots of Sultanahmet: Blue Mosque, Aya Sofia and Topkapi Palace. Plenty of restaurants and shops in the area (less than 5 mins walk), tram line and a lot of taxis will easily get you to any other district of Istanbul. The hotel itself is nice and comfortable, staff is extremely friendly and helpful. We highly recommend this place to stay for your vacation in Istanbul and consider it to be a very good value for the price you pay. Good luck!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely small and comfy hotel ideally located, perfect for a short city break”
Reviews.Author: danTA100
Reviews.Content: New hotel located a few minutes walk from most of the important sights of old Istanbul. Quaint shops for tourists and lots of good restaurants in the area for tasty and romantic meals. Trust the staff's recommendations ! . Extremely friendly staff , very obliging and welcoming , free shuttle on arrival was easily arranged. Do not be put off by the "business " street where the hotel is located - inside it is quiet and cozy. Rooms are small but well designed, very clean and new. Nice shower . TV has 700 channels - probably none in English - but then you do not come to Istanbul for the TV !! . Breakfast was plain but fresh and plentiful. Istanbul is an exciting city . The White house is perfect for those that want a good ,simple , friendly and comfortable place to stay at the end of a day of site seeing . Hope all the good reviews do not make it more expensive!!

Reviews.Title: “The best place with wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: sodIsrael
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 3 nights room 105 in White House Hotel All I say about the hotel did not describe the truth It was a pleasure to stay in this hotel Great team with a great smile that only want to help. Executive team to the last hotel employees give personal attention and feel at home all along Rooms clean and shiny with maximum comfort Excellent location Good breakfast (would be nice if you could only add a few more types of bread) Free Internet !!! My fear that the next time I will visit Istanbul will not be available room in the hotel

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Comfortable Stay”
Reviews.Author: leona1944
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend this hotel to friends and family. The rooms were spacious and immaculate, the location couldn't have been more convenient, but the icing on the cake was the courteous and friendly staff. It was like a home away from home. We will ddefinitely stay here again on our future trips to Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “A hotel with a personal touch making a a visit to a great city even better.”
Reviews.Author: brocpet
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the White House Hotel for 5 nights on vacation and thoroughly enjoyed our stay . The hotel is positioned well for visiting the main sights and the staff could not be any more helpful. We hope to get back to Istanbul sometime and will be checking for availability with this hotel when we do. THANK YOU.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible Staff”
Reviews.Author: StelaPaneva
Reviews.Content: We staied for 2 nights in White House Hotel Istanbul before our trip to Thiland. Everything was more than perfect. The staff is very polite and wiling to help us for any request. The hotel location is great - very near to Blue Mosque and to St Sofia. The hotel is new and very clean. I can say just one word - PERFECT. If we go again in Instanbul for sure will stay again in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay”
Reviews.Author: louborrelli
Reviews.Content: Having stayed at a number of hotels in the last 8 months, I finally found a real gem. Fantastic people, great location, clean and new, and, did I mention great people.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal position, lovely warm friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: RobandAli4
Reviews.Content: This hotel is positioned ideally for visiting all the attractions in the old city, close to good restaurants and the tram. We spent 6 nights at the hotel from 19th.February. The hotel is in exceptional condition and the rooms were clean and maintained daily. We had the first 2 nights in standard double room 405 on the top floor with a balcony (but this was fairly small), so we were moved for the remaining 4 nights to room 105 which was slightly bigger and better. Right from the first welcome the staff were excellent in every respect - they willingly did everything to satisfy our needs and make our stay as happy as possible - our thanks go to Elif, Omer, Cafer and Gokhan as well as those not mentioned. The trip was a treat for my wife's birthday, and we were surprised to be given a lovely birthday cake and a bottle of wine by the hotel management (an excellent gesture which was very much appreciated). Apart from the size of the initial room, the breakfast was the only area where we were not totally delighted - it was sort of continental style but could be improved with a broader selection of breads and fresh fruit, and the coffee / tea drinks area was somewhat cramped. However, we consider this hotel to be excellent value for money and would not hesitate to return / recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “An Elegant & Welcoming Place - Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: MikeAbroad66
Reviews.Content: The sincere warmth of our welcome - and the wonderful ongoing, personal care we received from this lovely hotel was among the highlights of our trip to Istanbul. The hotel itself was wonderful. Set on a quiet street only blocks from the Blue Mosque and other old-city delights, it was recently refurbished and redecorated like-new, but retaining the features that many of us appreciate about older buildings - high ceilings, lovely plaster work, spacious rooms, etc. Tasteful decoration. The service could not have been better. We were treated like honored family by Elif - the lovely young-lady at reception. Our every need was met - and then some. Our experience was outstanding and we highly recommend the White House. Excellent restaurants near-by. The ONLY negative was that we found that the noise of the TV of the room next door intruded on our tranquility - but a call to management took care of that problem.

Reviews.Title: “I was made extremely welcome”
Reviews.Author: PeeBee81
Reviews.Content: I found this hotel on Trip advisor, (thanks to all the other reviewers) and really can't say enough good things about Elif Omar and co, the hotel is lovely, smart clean and efficiently run, The owners can't do enough for you, they even gave me a choice of rooms. And the position in the heart of the old city, less than five minutes walk from Aya Sofia, Tophapi and the Grand Bazaar is perfect. The view from the roof is pretty good too :-)

Reviews.Title: “Great place.”
Reviews.Author: Skyluca
Reviews.Content: Great staff. Very helpful and really kind. All advices for siteseeing bars & restarants were perfect. A plus plus place!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect holiday in perfect hotel”
Reviews.Author: livia_busseni
Reviews.Content: We just came back from a fantastic holiday in Istanbul and we couldn't have chosen a better holel for our stay. The White House Hotel is perfectly situated in the Sultanamhet area near all the major sites in the old town, it is great quality for money and the staff has been very professional and helpful. Elif, Omar, Cafar are a fantastic team! We would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone thinking of going to Istanbul. Livia and Geoff ( Petts Wood - England)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: RomaRoma79
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel with excellent location right in the center! The staff very friendly, the rooms very nice and clean. Overall Excellent.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: Expats3
Reviews.Content: We spent 5 nights at the White House Hotel on our recent vacation to Istanbul. This hotel was a great choice. The hotel is in a perfect location since it is a short distance from all the major cultural/historical sights and the tram, but not on a noisy major street. The hotel is very new and exceptionally clean. Our triple room was spacious. But, I must say that the best part of this hotel is the excellent owner and staff. They were so friendly and helpful. They were never too busy to answer our questions or help us make a dinner reservation or recommend a sight seeing location. We enjoyed our stay with them!

Reviews.Title: “Tesekurlariniz”
Reviews.Author: veisauv
Reviews.Content: Thank you! It was impotent hollyday! We are stay in cultural and historic centre of old sity Istanbul, are not far from Hagia Sofia, Grand bazaar & Sultanahmet.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: mazamila
Reviews.Content: The hotel is great place to stay! We were treated like home. We stayed four nights in the hotel and we really liked. Staff was great and helpful (thanks to Elif, Omar, Cafarâ€¦). Location is excellent and very close to the main historical sites.

Reviews.Title: “Very, very good”
Reviews.Author: Chrisffm1
Reviews.Content: A very nice hotel with very good location. The staff are extremely polite, courteous and friendly. One has the feeling to be among friends. On my next visit to Istanbul, the hotel I would absolutely book again. Many thanks to the staff. We see each other again.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, good location and very comfortable”
Reviews.Author: tat2loser
Reviews.Content: Staff was great, very polite and helpful. Location is excellent in Sultanahmet. My room was very comfortable and clean, I have already suggested it to friends coming to Istanbul soon and I will be staying there when I visit again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value, centrally located hotel”
Reviews.Author: LemonBear
Reviews.Content: Really nice hotel with very friendly staff. We were told that it had only recently opened (~6 weeks go) and everything looked new. I shared a room with my boyfriend which was a little on the small side but perfectly ok. Three friends shared another room, which was more spacious with a double and single bed (and a larger shower). Location is great with the tram stop only a few minutes walk away and some nice bars just up the hill. Breakfast is basic but fine. Enjoy your stay!

Reviews.Title: “Would recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: annwatts5
Reviews.Content: Firstly , I should say this hotel had a tough act to follow. I had just spent 3 nights at the Ritz Carlton Istanbul on business, and decided to stay on 1 night to see Istanbul. Chose this hotel (from tripadvisor) on the basis of its location ( the Ritz is well away from the main sights) and the price ( well I was paying myself for this night!). it would have been easy to be disppointed , but this hotel met my requirements. Firstly the location is absolutely excellent ...the closeness to main sights is not exaggerated, and it is also easy to get from the hotel to them without getting lost! Secondly the staff were so warm and inviting and helpful. They gave us directions, srecommended a restaurant around the corner for the evening which was excellent and sorted out a car to the airport. I had some trouble with the heating in my room, but they came immediately to sort it out, and nothing was too much trouble. If you want a convenient, reasonably priced, clean and friendly hotel you would struggle to do better.

Reviews.Title: “everything you could want at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: Sojourners35
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were in Istanbul for seven nights in late January til February 1, 2010. We had initially booked at another hotel, up the street, but since it was undergoing major renovation, we worked out a deal to move to the White House. What a good move that was! The location is excellent, within walking distance of most of the famous sites and within one block of public transport. There are excellent restaurants within half a block but the street upon which it's located is quiet. It just opened last month and is small with a friendly staff, excellent management and beautiful rooms and lobby. The breakfast room is nice and the food good. Each night, upon returning to the hotel, we felt as though we were returning home. We had tea with the staff several times and enjoyed their company, but if we had not wanted to socialize, they would have understood. Elif is a lovely young woman and Harun, Cadir and others are very pleasant and helpful. The bathrooms are well-equipped and the rooms are decorated with nice details. The beds are very comfortable and we slept soundly each night. The staff speaks good English and perhaps other languages as well. They also offer pick-up from or deliver to the airport free (one-way). For a hotel in this price range, we would highly recommend this hotel for any traveler - with or without family.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent staff, Excellent hotel,Excellent location, comes highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: iloveagoodholiday
Reviews.Content: My first trip to Istanbul, you get a very warm welcome from the moment you step into the door, the staff are friendly, the rooms and bathroom are decorated with exceptional high quality. I went with my sister and didnt know much about where to go or what to see, the staff will give you some recommendations but the hotel is within minutes walking distance of the Blue Mosque and Sofia. I would recommend to anyone who is going for a few days, gift shops, restaurants and the metroline are all close, the metro system is very easy to use and generally cheaper than getting a taxi

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, helpful staff, nice rooms.”
Reviews.Author: quocanh
Reviews.Content: Almost everything is excellent, especially the location. But be prepared that the breakfast is limited and rooms do not have much view.

Reviews.Title: “Best Location and Service for the Price”
Reviews.Author: MasterLu
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 days and location was the main reason we chose this hotel. Turn right at the end of the street and you are at the Hagia Sofia. The hotel organised for us to be collected from the Airport (free as we had booked 3 nights) - and as we were landing at 2am (and being 2 girls!) this was important - the guy was there waiting for us - with a sign and everything! All very smooth. The service at the hotel is excellent, and as previous reviewers have said - they are a new hotel and eager to please. Also, as previous reviewers have said: the breakfast could be improved but the rooms are large and exceedingly comfortable, good showers, very, very clean. So, thanks to everyone at the White House from me and Claire ! We had a great time in Istanbul and staying at this hotel added to our enjoyment. cheers !

Reviews.Title: “Like being on honeymoon again.”
Reviews.Author: Gafnoo
Reviews.Content: From the moment we walked into the Whitehouse Hotel,We were treated really wonderfully,like family .You can't help but feel instantly at home here. Having done quite a bit of travelling ,we found this hotel one of the best we have stayed in so far if not the best. So maybe its because its a fairly new hotel,the decor is very beautiful,the rooms look like bridal suites.But to top it all you have a very professional staff they make you feel special,we don't want to mention names,but they know who they are they speak decent english and are at your every beck and call. We did not know about this hotel.We changed from another hotel after been recommended.Now that we have read what others have to say we could not agree more. If we should ever visit Turkey again which is a must visit holiday destination,the Whitehouse,would be our choice of hotel ,anytime.Very central to everything!

Reviews.Title: “bargain price for a good level hotel”
Reviews.Author: mauranie
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice for our 5-days visit in Istanbul. The hotel is brand new and willing to impress new clients. The position is wonderful for both walking to all main monuments and 1 minute from public transport. Large and clean rooms - everything's new. The breakfast could be improved but the staff is very friendly and helpful. Very good price.
